title: plimanshiny
text: start using plimanshiny, need load package call app run_app(). app initiate display following home screen. comprises four primary modules analysis orthomosaics. Initially, need import mosaic (1), proceed either build import shapefile (2). Additionally, option compute vegetation indexes (3), ultimately, analyze mosaics (4).

title: plimanshiny
text: importing mosaic, several settings (1-3) can configured. Firstly, configure mosaic bands (1). default, ‘BGR’ system (bands 1, 2, 3) used, Red-Edge NIR bands assigned layers 4 5. can also define upper lower quantiles color stretching configuration (3). Lastly, set maximum number pixels render map plot. Choosing larger value result high-resolution leaflet plots, rendering time may considerably increase. Utilizing browse button (4), can search upload mosaic file, maximum upload size approximately 2GB. three options visualizing mosaic: ‘rgb’ RGB plot, ‘mapview’ interactive map, ‘bands’ plot individual layers (5). mosaic needs cropped region interest analysis, can switch “” (6). option allows users crop mosaic using ‘Draw Rectangle’ tool necessary. Finally, can save mosaic (7).  mosaic uploaded, relevant informations shown pop-.

title: plimanshiny
text: “shapefile” module can utilized building importing shapefile (1). constructing shapefile, users option configure shape style, generating either grid plot “free” shape. delineate plot area, utilize “Draw Polygon” tool. number rows columns can specified, buffering factor (5) available. ’s important note negative values remove areas plot edge. polygon completed, built plots displayed. Click “shapefile finished” (3) conclude plot creation process.  plots created, can edit toggling “Edit drawn plots?” switch. step, flexibility reshape, move, delete individual plots. finalize editing process, check “Edition finished” box.

title: plimanshiny
text: shapefile already available, can import (1). also possible define palette color plots variables available shapefile.

title: plimanshiny
text: Calculating vegetation indices straightforward. Users need choose either built-indexes (1) personalize (2). list personalized indexes can provided separating index comma (“,”). ’s important note index must computed considering bands (R, G, B, RE, NIR) names mosaic’s layers. Finally, users can select index synchronization basemap (3).

title: plimanshiny
text: “Analyze” module works magic. Users can first set option define summarization function extracted indexes (1), mean default. Following , options plot individual segmentation provided. neither plots individuals segmented, indexes (computed “Index” module) extracted, mean computed shape (defined “Shapefile” module). “Segment individuals” selected (2), various options defining segmentation performed become available. Firstly, users must define index used segmentation (3), set threshold value (5), decide whether invert segmentation (7), specify tolerance extension arguments watershed segmentation (9). additional details , refer analyze_objects() function. Objects less 15% overall mean area removed default, factor controlled “Lower noise” option (11). reduce noise, ’s also possible apply median filtering mask (12). right, click “Analyze mosaic!”  mosaic analyzed, can view summary results plot individual levels. Attributes plots individuals can selected plotted map (2).  Finally, results can exported shapefiles (5) sent variable R environment (6). Results exported directly R environment
